about_the_game:
Somewhere in rural Washington, USA...

The year is 3058. Humanity is dead, and a race of robots called Symbions have taken their place.

You are Vikku "Ebic" Lamphart, a cloaked, vampiric Symbion.

Presumed dead and buried six feet under, you burst out of your grave, only to find your world invaded by demonic entities and corroded with rifts to the Underworld. Angered yet determined, you brandish your cross and proceed to dive head first into Hell's nine rings, ready to vanquish these beasts, strike down their mastermind, and save the mortal realm.

A setting of the Nine Rings of Hell from Dante's Inferno and the Eldabyss universe

Eldabyss is a kickass, lightning fast, and unapologetically brutal platformer where you run, gun, slash, and dash through the rings of Hell on a wild goose chase to locate your rival. Threatening the mortal realm and by extension the universe, it's left all up to you to stop him in his tracks before he attains the perfect vessel to become the False God.

Drawn inspiration from all your new and old favorites

Grabbing tons of inspiration from the classics - such as Castlevania, Metroid, Kirby - and the nextgen - Super Meat Boy, Quake, Hollow Knight, and more - Eldabyss learns from example and packs everything you loved about your other platforming favorites into one neat package.

REALLY fast paced platforming

Air tight controls, almost unnecessary amounts of movement tech, and tons of ways to gain momentum and traverse Hell - everything you could dream of in a platformer is all right here!

A large arsenal of badass weapons and combat techniques

Whether it's pulverizing the crowds with the Shot-Crucifix, blasting yourself into the air with the Nailed Rocket, shredding through the strong and the weak with the Bulletstream, or finding your way with any of the rest of the otherworldly and unreal arsenal at your fingertips, Eldabyss has something just for you.

Tense bossfights

Put your skills to the test and play the offensive or defensive roles in thrilling bossfights against the cores of Hell, machines, gods and goddesses, heavier demons, cultists, or maybe even go head to head with enemies you make along the way...

Secrets...

Dive even deeper into the abyss! Find small secrets spread all throughout the universe, backtrack and open doors that were locked, and even find new challenges that were hidden before!

Cinematic cutscenes

Whether it's swapping stories, reuniting with friends, making plans, being set off for quests, confronting deities, or even just paying a visit to your local shopkeeper, Eldabyss is filled with unique and compelling scenery even when you're not shredding demons.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has moderate use of profanity in dialogue, an abundance of scenes featuring intense animated blood/gore, and sexual themes as well as nudity on characters is to be expected.
However, since the game follows a 16-bit pixel artstyle, details on all this content are not entirely present.

name: Eldabyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5700, or AMD Ryzen 7 5700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Sexuelle Inhalte
Derbe Sprache

short_description: A fast-paced, bloody, gothic, and stylish platformer video game about saving the mortal realm from the wrath of Hell's armies.
